node.title: Man accused of abducting Cleo Smith from her family's tent to face court in Carnarvon
node.alt: Cleo Smith's alleged abductor Terence Kelly at an airport with police
node.description: The man accused of abducting four-year-old Cleo Smith is due to make his second appearance in court today, in the northern WA town where the drama unfolded.
node.content:
["The man accused of abducting four-year-old Cleo Smith is due to make his second appearance in court today in the northern WA town where the drama unfolded.", "Terence Darrell Kelly, 36, is not expected to appear in the Carnarvon Magistrates Court in person, but rather appear via video link from Casuarina maximum security prison in Perth.", "He was transferred there\u00a0the day after being arrested by police and\u00a0charged with forcibly taking a child under 16.", "It is alleged he took Cleo from her family's tent at the Quobba Blowholes campsite, about 70 kilometres from Carnarvon where they lived, in the early hours of October 16.", "", "
The site at the Blowholes campgrounds north of Carnarvon in WA where Cleo Smith's family tent was pitched.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "A massive land, air and sea search started immediately, and a $1 million dollar reward was offered by the state government, but no trace of the four-year-old was found\u00a0until 18 days later.", "That is when police officers, one wearing a body camera, stormed into a locked house in Tonkin Crescent in Carnarvon and found Cleo awake and playing with toys.", "", "
Detective Senior Sergeant Cameron Blaine was one of the police officers who found Cleo Smith.(ABC News: Evelyn Manfield)
", "The property was only minutes away from the house were Cleo lives with her mum, Ellie, and\u00a0stepfather Jake.", "Around the same time, police pulled over a car in the town and arrested Terence Kelly, who lived at the Tonkin Crescent address.", "He was charged the next day, after receiving treatment in hospital for what were believed to be self-inflicted injuries.", "Mr Kelly was not required to plead to the child stealing charge during his first, brief appearance in a Carnarvon court last month and did not apply for\u00a0release on bail.", "The following day he was flown out of the town to Perth and transferred to Casuarina prison, where he has been held ever since.", "", "
Terence Kelly was transferred to Casuarina prison after being flown to Perth from Carnarvon.
", "After his arrest, forensic investigators spent days at his home, removing bags and bags of items, to be analysed and collated in laboratories in preparation for the court case ahead.", "Once that was completed, all signs of the police presence were removed from the house, the doors and windows were boarded up and it was left vacant.", "Today's scheduled court appearance is expected to be brief and because it is still very early in the court proceedings.", "It is not expected that he will be required to enter a plea to the two charges he is facing."]
